entry.title: SPECIAL AIR QUALITY STATEMENT, Williams Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:03 a.m. PDT Tuesday 9 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early this evening with risk of thunderstorms. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Tuesday 9 May 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 20. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers late in the afternoon with risk of thunderstorms. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h early in the afternoon. High 20. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Tuesday 9 May 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers in the evening with risk of thunderstorms. Low 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Tuesday 9 May 2023
